attributes.action: All job centre employees should under go customer service training
attributes.additional_details: While being on job seekers allowance & looking for work, i'am now considered long term unemployed, im forever being spoken down to & these 'advisors' treat you as though they have stepped in something nasty 3 million unemployed uk born british people, We are all unemployed & we all get treated differently, We should treat each other the same & more so by these job centre workers you are not allowed to complain if you do they ignore it, its their job to help you find work not treat you like a naughty child & look at you with distain, why is it it accetable ? because the goverment, the people above can get away with it, just because we are unemployed does not mean we are all scroungers & a waste of time & money. Put all job centre workers on customer service courses & have performance reviews making sure we are getting the help promised by them, if people complain they should be sacked and made to sit on the dole with the rest of us.
